snippet.title: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO – Android Saga Character Trailer
snippet.description:
Is there such a thing as perfection? Only for a select few.
Pre-Order DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO: https://www.bnent.eu/PreorderDBSZ
#DBSZ

The Music used in the video is not available in the base game. It is included in a DLC Anime Song Pack sold separately.

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
